item.title: Week 13: Visual Learning Analytics (SIG5)
item.description: Visual Learning Analytics is an emerging field, while visual analytics is defined as “the science of analytical reasoning facilitated by interactive visual interfaces”. 1. Read and annotate “Visual Learning Analytics of Education Data: A Systematic Literature Review and Research Agenda” (Vieira et al., 2018) After reading, play around with a few of these “visualization tools from the literature review”. The visualizations all have a lot of switches and toggles so feel free to mess around with them.
